title: Reduction of polystyrene/polyurethane plastic wastes from the environment into binders for water-resistant emulsion paints
content:
Publication date: 30 March 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 6

Author(s): Sunday A. Osemeahon, Ayodele Akinterinwa, Esther Fasina, Fartisincha P. Andrew, Muhammed H. Shagal, Semiu A. Kareem, Usaku Reuben, Patience U. Onyebuchi, Olubukola R. Adelagun, David Esenowo
